title: Calib3R: A 3D Foundation Model for Multi-Camera to Robot Calibration and 3D Metric-Scaled Scene Reconstruction
summary: This paper introduces Calib3R, a 3D Foundation Model for multi-camera to robot calibration and 3D metric-scaled scene reconstruction. It addresses the need for accurate 3D scene representation from RGB images for robot interaction tasks.
usefulness_reason: The summary mentions "3D scene representation" and "RGB images" which implies a contextual dataset with spatial information. While not explicitly spatio-temporal point process or survey data, the focus on 3D scene data makes it relevant to "Contextual dataset".
